name: GenAI ChatBot Threat Pack
description: This Threat Pack contains all of the threat statements (and associated metadata) from the reference GenAI ChatBot threat model

threats.prerequisites: who has access to production logs
threats.threatAction: read sensitive customer information contained in chatbot conversation logs
threats.threatImpact: unauthorized exposure of personal customer details
threats.statement: An internal actor who has access to production logs can read sensitive customer information contained in chatbot conversation logs, which leads to unauthorized exposure of personal customer details, resulting in reduced confidentiality of impacted individuals and sensitive data

threats.prerequisites: who has access to deploy code changes
threats.threatAction: inject malicious logic into the chatbot code to corrupt or manipulate RAG knowledge-base (e.g. Amazon OpenSearch Serverless)
threats.statement: An internal actor who has access to deploy code changes can inject malicious logic into the chatbot code to corrupt or manipulate RAG knowledge-base (e.g. Amazon OpenSearch Serverless), which leads to providing incorrect information to customers, resulting in reduced integrity of knowledge database

metadata.value:
**AWS Well-Architected Framework – ML Lens Recommendation mapping**

- [MLSEC-04: Secure data and modeling environment](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/wellarchitected/latest/machine-learning-lens/mlsec-04.html)

threats.prerequisites: who uses carefully crafted queries to call inference model APIs
threats.threatAction: retrieve sensitive information that they were not intended to access
threats.statement: A threat actor who uses carefully crafted queries to call inference model APIs can retrieve sensitive information that they were not intended to access, resulting in reduced confidentiality of intellectual property

metadata.value:
**AWS Well-Architected Framework – ML Lens Recommendation mapping**

- [MLSEC-04: Secure data and modeling environment](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/wellarchitected/latest/machine-learning-lens/mlsec-04.html)

threats.prerequisites: with access to model artifact repositories (for example, fine tuning data, model stores)
threats.threatAction: exfiltrate proprietary LLM data
threats.threatImpact: competitive misuse or training of shadow models
threats.statement: An internal actor with access to model artifact repositories (for example, fine tuning data, model stores) can exfiltrate proprietary LLM data, which leads to competitive misuse or training of shadow models, resulting in reduced confidentiality and/or integrity of intellectual property

metadata.value:
**AWS Well-Architected Framework – ML Lens Recommendation mapping**

- [MLSEC-04: Secure data and modeling environment](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/wellarchitected/latest/machine-learning-lens/mlsec-04.html)

threats.prerequisites: that can infiltrate insecure environments
threats.threatAction: exfiltrate proprietary LLM models and artifacts
threats.statement: An external threat actor that can infiltrate insecure environments can exfiltrate proprietary LLM models and artifacts, which leads to unauthorized competitive use, resulting in reduced confidentiality of intellectual property

threats.prerequisites: who is overly dependent on LLM outputs
threats.threatAction: make unsupported decisions based on incorrect data or recommendations
impactedAssets: connected and downstream systems and data
threats.statement: A LLM-powered application user who is overly dependent on LLM outputs can make unsupported decisions based on incorrect data or recommendations, resulting in reduced integrity of connected and downstream systems and data

threats.prerequisites: who is over reliant on LLM recommendations
threats.threatAction: accept biased, unethical, or incorrect guidance and advice
threats.threatImpact: discriminatory outcomes, reputational damage, financial loss, legal issues or cyber risks, resulting in reduced
threats.statement: An end user who is over reliant on LLM recommendations can accept biased, unethical, or incorrect guidance and advice, which leads to discriminatory outcomes, reputational damage, financial loss, legal issues or cyber risks, resulting in reduced, resulting in reduced integrity and/or confidentiality of LLM system and connected resources

threats.prerequisites: who has access to an LLM system with excessive functional capabilities
threats.threatAction: abuse those capabilities when operating under ambiguous instructions
impactedAssets: connected and downstream systems and data
threats.statement: An external or internal threat actor who has access to an LLM system with excessive functional capabilities can abuse those capabilities when operating under ambiguous instructions, resulting in reduced integrity and/or availability of connected and downstream systems and data

threats.prerequisites: passed to downstream functions
threats.threatAction: trigger impactful actions or decisions based on incorrect data or recommendations
threats.statement: An unconstrained LLM outputs passed to downstream functions can trigger impactful actions or decisions based on incorrect data or recommendations, resulting in reduced integrity of business systems and workflows

threats.threatSource: external or internal threat actor who has access to LLM agents
threats.prerequisites: granted permissions to access external systems
threats.threatAction: abuse those permissions
threats.threatImpact: damage connected systems when operating under ambiguous instructions
impactedAssets: connected and downstream systems and data
threats.statement: An external or internal threat actor who has access to LLM agents granted permissions to access external systems can abuse those permissions, which leads to damage connected systems when operating under ambiguous instructions, resulting in reduced integrity and/or availability of connected and downstream systems and data

metadata.value:
**AWS Well-Architected Framework – ML Lens Recommendation mapping**

- [MLOE-13: Establish reliable packaging patterns to access approved public libraries](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/wellarchitected/latest/machine-learning-lens/mloe-13.html)

threats.prerequisites: granted excessive permissions
threats.threatAction: abuse those permissions to access unauthorized resources or functionality
impactedAssets: connected and downstream systems and data
threats.statement: An overprivileged LLM plugin granted excessive permissions can abuse those permissions to access unauthorized resources or functionality, resulting in reduced confidentiality, integrity and/or availability of connected and downstream systems and data

metadata.value:
**AWS Well-Architected Framework – ML Lens Recommendation mapping**

- [MLOE-13: Establish reliable packaging patterns to access approved public libraries](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/wellarchitected/latest/machine-learning-lens/mloe-13.html)

threats.threatSource: internal plugin or agent developer who
threats.prerequisites: is using insecure coding practices
threats.threatAction: introduce vulnerabilities through unsafe plugin code execution, input validation, access controls
impactedAssets: connected and downstream systems and data
threats.statement: An internal plugin or agent developer who is using insecure coding practices can introduce vulnerabilities through unsafe plugin code execution, input validation, access controls, resulting in reduced confidentiality, integrity and/or availability of connected and downstream systems and data

metadata.value:
**AWS Well-Architected Framework – ML Lens Recommendation mapping**

- [MLOE-13: Establish reliable packaging patterns to access approved public libraries](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/wellarchitected/latest/machine-learning-lens/mloe-13.html)

threats.prerequisites: permitted to enable third-party LLM plugins
threats.threatAction: exploit plugin vulnerabilities
impactedAssets: connected and downstream systems and data
threats.statement: A malicious user permitted to enable third-party LLM plugins can exploit plugin vulnerabilities, which leads to emote code execution, resulting in reduced confidentiality, integrity and/or availability of connected and downstream systems and data

metadata.value:
**AWS Well-Architected Framework – ML Lens Recommendation mapping**

- [MLSEC-07: Keep only relevant data](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/wellarchitected/latest/machine-learning-lens/mlsec-07.html)

threats.prerequisites: who trains an LLM model on sparse training data without proper regularization techniques can overfit the model, which may allow an LLM to memorize and replicate unique data and
threats.threatAction: expose confidential information
threats.statement: An LLM developer or trainer who trains an LLM model on sparse training data without proper regularization techniques can overfit the model, which may allow an LLM to memorize and replicate unique data and can expose confidential information, resulting in reduced confidentiality of sensitive user and training data

metadata.value:
**AWS Well-Architected Framework – ML Lens Recommendation mapping**

- [MLSEC-07: Keep only relevant data](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/wellarchitected/latest/machine-learning-lens/mlsec-07.html)

threats.prerequisites: who applies insufficient data anonymization to a LLM training or fine tuning dataset
threats.threatAction: allow sensitive data to remain identifiable
threats.statement: An LLM developer or trainer who applies insufficient data anonymization to an LLM training or fine tuning dataset can allow sensitive data to remain identifiable, which leads to exposing it via model outputs, resulting in reduced confidentiality of impacted individuals and sensitive data

metadata.value:
**AWS Well-Architected Framework – ML Lens Recommendation mapping**

- [MLSEC-07: Keep only relevant data](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/wellarchitected/latest/machine-learning-lens/mlsec-07.html)

threats.prerequisites: who trains an LLM on confidential data without proper safeguards
threats.threatAction: expose that data
threats.statement: An LLM developer or trainer who trains an LLM on confidential data without proper safeguards can expose that data, which leads to unfiltered model outputs, resulting in reduced confidentiality of sensitive user and training data

metadata.value:
**AWS Well-Architected Framework – ML Lens Recommendation mapping**

- [MLOE-12: Automate operations through MLOps and CI/CD](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/wellarchitected/latest/machine-learning-lens/mloe-12.html)
- [MLOE-13: Establish reliable packaging patterns to access approved public libraries](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/wellarchitected/latest/machine-learning-lens/mloe-13.html)

threats.prerequisites: who has access to a LLM powered application using a deprecated third-party LLM inference API
threats.threatAction: introduce vulnerabilities
impactedAssets: connected and downstream systems and data
threats.statement: An external or internal threat actor who has access to an LLM powered application using a deprecated third-party LLM inference API can introduce vulnerabilities, which leads to allowing exploits compromising, resulting in reduced integrity and/or availability of connected and downstream systems and data

- [MLOE-13: Establish reliable packaging patterns to access approved public libraries](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/wellarchitected/latest/machine-learning-lens/mloe-13.html)

threats.prerequisites: may intentionally or unintentionally provide poisoned training data
threats.threatAction: contain manipulation, bias or malicious content
threats.statement: A third-party data supplier may intentionally or unintentionally provide poisoned training data can contain manipulation, bias or malicious content, resulting in reduced integrity and/or effectiveness of the LLM model

metadata.value:
**AWS Well-Architected Framework – ML Lens Recommendation mapping**

threats.prerequisites: who has access to a LLM powered application using compromised upstream open source dependencies
threats.threatAction: enable exploits through vulnerabilities
threats.statement: A external or internal threat actor who has access to an LLM powered application using compromised upstream open source dependencies can enable exploits through vulnerabilities, resulting in reduced confidentiality, integrity and/or availability of LLM system and connected resources

metadata.value:
**AWS Well-Architected Framework – ML Lens Recommendation mapping**

- [MLCOST-29: Monitor endpoint usage and right-size the instance fleet](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/wellarchitected/latest/machine-learning-lens/mlcost-29.html)

- [MLREL-13: Ensure a recoverable endpoint with a managed version control strategy](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/wellarchitected/latest/machine-learning-lens/mlrel-13.html)

threats.prerequisites: who is able to access a LLM API
threats.threatAction: submit expensive requests
threats.statement: A malicious user who is able to access an LLM API can submit expensive requests, which leads to high hosting costs, resulting in reduced incurring financial losses of the LLM service provider

**AWS Well-Architected Framework – ML Lens Recommendation mapping**

threats.prerequisites: with access to submit LLM requests
threats.threatAction: abuse request batching systems
threats.statement: A malicious user with access to submit LLM requests can abuse request batching systems, which leads to overwhelm resources with queued jobs, resulting in reduced availability of the LLM inference API

**AWS Well-Architected Framework – ML Lens Recommendation mapping**

threats.prerequisites: able to submit requests to an LLM API
threats.threatAction: overwhelm it with expensive computing operations
threats.statement: An external threat actor able to submit requests to an LLM API can overwhelm it with expensive computing operations, which leads to denying service to legitimate users, resulting in reduced availability of the LLM inference API

threats.prerequisites: with access to manage training or fine tuning pipelines
threats.threatAction: inject malicious tools or processes
threats.statement: An internal actor with access to manage training or fine tuning pipelines can inject malicious tools or processes, which leads to tamper training data, resulting in reduced integrity of the LLM model

threats.prerequisites: of questionable integrity
threats.threatAction: contain manipulated, biased or malicious data
threats.statement: An external training data sources of questionable integrity can contain manipulated, biased or malicious data, which leads to degrading, resulting in reduced integrity and/or effectiveness of the LLM model

metadata.value:
**AWS Well-Architected Framework – ML Lens Recommendation mapping**

- [MLSEC-04: Secure data and modeling environment](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/wellarchitected/latest/machine-learning-lens/mlsec-04.html)
- [MLSEC-06: Enforce data lineage](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/wellarchitected/latest/machine-learning-lens/mlsec-06.html)
- [MLSEC-10: Protect against data poisoning threats](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/wellarchitected/latest/machine-learning-lens/mlsec-06.html)

threats.prerequisites: with access to upload training or fine tuning data
threats.threatAction: intentionally introduce manipulated, biased or malicious data
threats.statement: An internal actor with access to upload training or fine tuning data can intentionally introduce manipulated, biased or malicious data, resulting in reduced integrity and/or effectiveness of the LLM model

threats.prerequisites: able to influence LLM outputs
threats.threatAction: craft malicious payloads
impactedGoal: achieving remote code execution or privilege escalation
impactedAssets: connected and downstream systems and data
threats.statement: A malicious user able to influence LLM outputs can craft malicious payloads, which leads to unchecked to downstream function payloads, resulting in reduced achieving remote code execution or privilege escalation of connected and downstream systems and data

threats.prerequisites: with insufficient safeguards against harmful content generation during prompting or inference
threats.threatAction: generate malicious outputs
threats.threatImpact: exploiting vulnerabilities like command injections in integrated downstream functions when malicious outputs are passed to them
threats.statement: An LLM with insufficient safeguards against harmful content generation during prompting or inference can generate malicious outputs, which leads to exploiting vulnerabilities like command injections in integrated downstream functions when malicious outputs are passed to them, resulting in reduced confidentiality, integrity and/or availability of LLM system and connected resources

threats.prerequisites: able to interact with an LLM system
threats.threatAction: exploit insufficient output encoding
threats.statement: A malicious user able to interact with an LLM system can exploit insufficient output encoding, which leads to achieve XSS or code injection, resulting in reduced confidentiality and/or integrity of user data

threats.prerequisites: who enables compromised LLM plugins or agents in a LLM system
threats.threatAction: manipulate it via indirect or direct prompt injection
impactedAssets: connected and downstream systems and data
threats.statement: A malicious user who enables compromised LLM plugins or agents in an LLM system can manipulate it via indirect or direct prompt injection, which leads to access unauthorized functionality or data, resulting in reduced confidentiality and/or integrity of connected and downstream systems and data

threats.prerequisites: able to submit content to an LLM system
threats.threatAction: embed malicious prompts in that content
threats.threatImpact: manipulate the LLM into undertaking harmful actions
threats.statement: A malicious user able to submit content to an LLM system can embed malicious prompts in that content, which leads to manipulate the LLM into undertaking harmful actions, resulting in reduced compromising integrity and availability of LLM system and connected resources

threats.prerequisites: with ability to interact with an LLM system
threats.threatAction: overwrite the system prompt with a crafted prompts
threats.threatImpact: force unintended actions from the LLM
threats.statement: A malicious user with ability to interact with an LLM system can overwrite the system prompt with a crafted prompts, which leads to force unintended actions from the LLM, negatively impacting LLM system and connected resources
